fr.ensimag.deca.tree

Class Tree

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ensimag.deca.tree.Tree
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDeclClass, AbstractDeclField, AbstractDeclMethod, AbstractDeclParam, AbstractDeclVar, AbstractInitialization, AbstractInst, AbstractMain, AbstractMethodBody, AbstractProgram, TreeList

    public abstract class Tree
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for any node in the Deca abstract syntax tree. Factors all the common elements and utility functions to manipulate trees (location in source-code, pretty-printing, ...).
    Author:
    gl49

      • prettyPrint

        public final java.lang.String prettyPrint()
        Pretty-print the tree as a String, using ASCII-art to show the tree hierarchy. Useful for debugging.

      • iter

        public void iter(TreeFunction f)
        Call function f on each node of the tree.
        Parameters:
        f -

      • checkAllDecorations

        public boolean checkAllDecorations()
        Check that all nodes of the tree have been correctly decorated. Useful for debugging/defensive programming.
        Returns:
        true. Raises an exception in case of error. The return value is meant to allow assert(tree.checkAllLocations()), to enable the defensive check only if assertions are enabled.

      • checkAllLocations

        public boolean checkAllLocations()
        Check that all nodes of the tree have a location correctly set. Useful for debugging/defensive programming.
        Returns:
        true. Raises an exception in case of error. The return value is meant to allow assert(tree.checkAllLocations()), to enable the defensive check only if assertions are enabled.
